ccre.util

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.util.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for utilities that don't fit anywhere else. Most utilites are in Mixing or CArrayUtils.
    See Also:
    Mixing, CArrayUtils

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FloatInputPoll currentTimeSeconds
      An input representing the current time in seconds.

    • Field Detail

      • currentTimeSeconds

        public static final FloatInputPoll currentTimeSeconds
        An input representing the current time in seconds. The value is equivalent to System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000.0f
        See Also:
        System.currentTimeMillis()

    • Method Detail

      • deadzone

        public static float deadzone(float value,
             float deadzone)
        Calculate a value with a deadzone. If the value is within the specified deadzone, the result will be zero instead.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        deadzone - the deadzone size
        Returns:
        the deadzoned version of the value

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String s,
                       char c)
        Split a string into parts delimited by the specified character.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to split.
        c - The delimiter.
        Returns:
        The parts of the string.

      • updateRamping

        public static float updateRamping(float previous,
                  float target,
                  float limit)
        Run a cycle of ramping code on the previous ramping value, target value, and acceleration limit. This will return the target value unless it's outside of the limit away from the previous ramping value, in which case it will be as close as possible.
        Parameters:
        previous - The previous ramping value.
        target - The target value.
        limit - The acceleration limit.
        Returns:
        The new value from the ramping cycle
